body.pretty:

⊣ TopRing = { hs0 ∈(TopGrp ⋂ Ring)|(mulGrp ` hs0)∈ TopMnd }
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0,(TopGrp ⋂ Ring))
⊣ d(hs0, c1 ∈ TopMnd)
